item.title: SSTable
item.description: #database [[Red-black tree]] [[AVL Tree]] When a write comes in, add it to an in-memory balanced tree data structure ([[memtable]]) When the [[memtable]] gets bigger than the thresh-hold, typically a few megabytes, write out it to disk as an [[SSTable]] The new [[SSTable]] becomes the most recent segment of the database, while the [[SSTable]] is being written into disk, writes can continue to a new [[memtable]] instance.
